entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: North to northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.summary: Northeast winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northeast winds may approach severe gale in exposed places, turning northwest then westerly Thursday morning. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Expect 70 to 90 mm of rain. Peak rates of 15 to 25 mm/h, but 25 to 40 mm/h in possible thunderstorms and localised downpours. Please note, rain eases from the west. Impact: Streams and rivers may rise rapidly. Surface flooding, slips, and difficult driving conditions possible. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Minimal.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
